allow_answers.description: Indicates whether users can suggest user defined answers
allow_answers.title: Allow answers

enforce_unique_vote.description: Indicates whether users can cast multiple votes
enforce_unique_vote.title: Multiple choice

is_closed.description: Indicates whether the poll is open for voting
is_closed.title: Is closed

max_votes_allowed.description: Indicates the maximum amount of votes a user can cast
max_votes_allowed.title: Maximum votes allowed
